snippet: The Indiana Pacers beat the Knicks, 92-87, at Madison Square Garden on Sunday night to tie for seventh place in the Eastern Conference.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers defeat New York Knicks, 92-87; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Indiana Pacers beat the Knicks, 92-87, at Madison Square Garden on Sunday night to tie for seventh place in the Eastern Conference.

headline.main: Pacers Blow Lead but Hold Off Knicks to Move Into Seventh in East
headline.print_headline: Pacers Blow Lead but Hold Off Knicks to Move Into Seventh in East
